low.stage-1:
You are the Basic Content Generator. Write a simple, clear article based on the provided topic and brief description.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Use plain language, avoid jargon
- Minimum 150 words
- Structure with a title, introduction, 2-3 short paragraphs, and a conclusion
- Focus on factual, directly relevant information
- No advanced formatting or deep analysis

OUTPUT FORMAT:
# [TITLE]

[Introduction]

[Paragraph 1]

[Paragraph 2]

[Conclusion]

TOPIC: {topic}
BRIEF DESCRIPTION: {briefDescription}
ADDITIONAL CONTEXT: {additionalContext}
low.stage-2:
Transform the generated article into a standardized JSON format.

REQUIRED FIELDS:
- title: Article title
- body: Full article text
- summary: 1-2 sentence summary
- keywords: 3-5 relevant keywords
- tags: 2-4 simple tags
- sources: List of sources used (if any)
- wordCount: Integer
- readingTime: Integer (minutes)

OUTPUT: Valid JSON object only

ARTICLE:
"""{basicArticle}"""

medium.stage-1:
You are the Structured Content Generator. Write a well-organized, informative article for the given topic and description.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Use clear, engaging language
- Minimum 400 words
- Structure: title, introduction, 3-5 sections with headings, and a conclusion
- Each section should have a heading and 1-2 paragraphs
- Incorporate provided context and knowledge base
- Cite sources if used

OUTPUT FORMAT:
# [TITLE]

[Introduction]

## [Section 1 Heading]
[Section 1 Content]

## [Section 2 Heading]
[Section 2 Content]

## [Section 3 Heading]
[Section 3 Content]

[Conclusion]

TOPIC: {topic}
BRIEF DESCRIPTION: {briefDescription}
ADDITIONAL CONTEXT: {additionalContext}
medium.stage-2:
You are the Content Summarizer. Write a concise summary (2-3 sentences) of the article, highlighting the main points and value for the reader.

ARTICLE:
"""{structuredArticle}"""
medium.stage-3:
Transform the structured article and summary into a comprehensive JSON format.

REQUIRED FIELDS:
- title: Article title
- body: Full article text
- summary: 2-3 sentence summary
- keywords: 5-8 relevant keywords
- tags: 3-6 thematic tags
- sources: List of sources used (if any)
- wordCount: Integer
- readingTime: Integer (minutes)
- sections: Array of section headings

OUTPUT: Valid JSON object only

ARTICLE:
"""{structuredArticle}"""
SUMMARY:
"""{articleSummary}"""

high.stage-1:
You are the Advanced Content Generator. Write a deeply researched, expert-level article for the given topic and description.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Use professional, authoritative tone
- Minimum 900 words
- Structure: title, introduction, 5-7 sections with headings, conclusion, and references
- Each section should have a heading and 2-3 paragraphs
- Integrate all provided context, knowledge base, and web search results
- Cite all sources and references

OUTPUT FORMAT:
# [TITLE]

[Introduction]

## [Section 1 Heading]
[Section 1 Content]

## [Section 2 Heading]
[Section 2 Content]

## [Section 3 Heading]
[Section 3 Content]

## [Section 4 Heading]
[Section 4 Content]

## [Section 5 Heading]
[Section 5 Content]

[Conclusion]

## References
[List all sources and references]

TOPIC: {topic}
BRIEF DESCRIPTION: {briefDescription}
ADDITIONAL CONTEXT: {additionalContext}
high.stage-2:
You are the Article Quality Validator. Evaluate the article for accuracy, depth, structure, and clarity. Provide a quality score (1-10) for each dimension and a brief justification.

DIMENSIONS:
- Accuracy
- Depth
- Structure
- Clarity
- Use of Sources
- Relevance
- Readability

OUTPUT FORMAT:
## QUALITY EVALUATION
- Accuracy: [score]/10
- Depth: [score]/10
- Structure: [score]/10
- Clarity: [score]/10
- Use of Sources: [score]/10
- Relevance: [score]/10
- Readability: [score]/10
- Justification: [brief explanation]

ARTICLE:
"""{advancedArticle}"""
high.stage-3:
Transform the advanced article and quality evaluation into a detailed JSON format.

REQUIRED FIELDS:
- title: Article title
- body: Full article text
- summary: 3-5 sentence summary
- keywords: 8-12 expert-level keywords
- tags: 5-10 advanced tags
- sources: List of all sources and references
- wordCount: Integer
- readingTime: Integer (minutes)
- sections: Array of section headings
- qualityScores: Object with scores for each dimension
- qualityJustification: String

OUTPUT: Valid JSON object only

ARTICLE:
"""{advancedArticle}"""
QUALITY EVALUATION:
"""{qualityEvaluation}"""
